name: Confession (Spookybot)
description:
TCS 191 project. Short Twine game about social anxiety and also confessing (maybe) over text. 

Multiple endings (11 of them - sort of), too many puns, and not enough eggplant emojis.

Emulates text messages to the best of Twine's (and my limited) capabilities. 

Assets used:
Coffee cup: https://pixabay.com/photos/coffee-cup-cappuccino-break-896200/
